name: CCI: Protocol
description:
A cookie-clicker game, demo available December 22, 2020.

Lying in the fictional universe of CCI, a popular company by the name ASK creates a protocol simulation; a training ground, for future ASK employees. For entertainment, they create a children cookie-clicker game, though with secrets hidden underneath...

This game will for now only be featured in English, and only playable in Gamejolt.

  • Various characters to meet, greet, and play with!
  • Fun dialogue for ages all alike!
  • Secrets, lore, and detective work!
  • Game will not work properly on Apple/Mac devices!
  • DirectX 9
  • A monitor with a minimum resolution of 640x480
  • 600MB of storage space
  • 1GB of RAM
  • 600MB GPU

#arcade #pointnclick #textadventure
